Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:冒

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+5192

Main pronunciation 主要发音: mào

Other pronunciations 其它发音: mào,mò

Original meaning 本义: Meaning (orig) hat (now) to dare to.

English senses 英语理解: risk, brave, dare

Usage example 用法举例: 冒昧 mào mèi (make bold)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 1368

Shuowen 说文解字: 冡而前也從冃從目

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 冐 older 冒 from (rem- 月 yuè) from hat-cover 冃 mào and eye 目 mù C391 冒<冐> simp 冒. (name- eye-cover-brave 冒 mào)

冐字的基本解释

冐
mào
古同“冒”。

冐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mào］
［《廣韻》莫報切，去号，明。］
［《廣韻》莫北切，入德，明。］
亦作“冐1”。
(1)“帽”的古字。帽子。
(2)指戴帽。
(3)古代殓尸的布囊，由上下两截合成。
(4)指敛尸。
(5)覆盖，笼罩。
(6)引申为掩护。
(7)蒙住。
(8)包容，统括。
(9)漫溢；淹没。
(10)侵犯，冲犯。
(11)违犯；冒犯。
(12)贸然，冒昧。
(13)假冒；冒充。
(14)顶着；不顾。
(15)向外透；往上升。
(16)冒进。超过实际可能行事。
(17)犹贪。
(18)中医病症名。病者神智不清。
(19)方言。没有。
(20)方言。表示行为未经深思熟虑，或无把握。
(21)通“懋”。勉力。
(22)通“媢”。妒忌。
(23)同“瑁”。玉制礼器。
(24)通“芼”。菜蔬。
(25)姓。明有冒政。见《明史》本传。
[②]［mò］
亦作“冐2”。
见“冒2頓”。

冐字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【冂字部】　冐； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页129第17
【篇海】俗昌字。

冐字的起名意思

暂无。

冐
Basic explanation of words
冐
mào
Gu Tong "takes off".
冐
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mào］
["Guang Yun" don't report to cut, go to the number, Ming. ]
["Guangyun" Mo Beiqie, enter the German, Ming. ]
Also known as "冐1".
(1) The ancient word for "hat". hat.
(2) Refers to wearing a hat.
(3) The cloth pouch of ancient mortuary is composed of upper and lower sections.
(4) Refers to grabbing corpses.
(5) Cover, shroud.
(6) Extended to cover.
(7) Blindfolded.
(8) Tolerant and inclusive.
(9) Overflowing; submerged.
(10) Violation, offense.
(11) Violation; offense.
(12) Hastily and presumptuously.
(13) Counterfeit; impersonation.
(14) Withstand; disregard.
(15) Penetrate outward; upward.
(16) Adventurously. Act beyond what is actually possible.
(17) Still greedy.
(18) The name of the TCM disease. The patient is delirious.
(19) Dialects. No.
(20) Dialects. Indicates that the behavior is unthoughtful or unsure.
(21) Link "Mao". Reluctantly.
(22) Through "women". jealous.
(23) Same as "瑁". Jade ritual vessels.
(24) Through "芼". vegetables.
(25) Last name. Obviously abusive. See the biography of "Ming History".
[②]［mò］
Also known as "冐2".
See "Taking 2 Meals".
冐
